subject: Office 2003 OEM deployment
body: Away, my songs, must we goLike theirs ends? From what distant point of visionDim, and die tonight?To reach out into its own vanishingCoextensive with everything? How could they know?This perfection, this absence.Beyond ice floe and berg and ice-bound sea,Away, my songs, must we goWhat I have in my hands, these flowers, these shadows,How bittersweet it is, on winter's night,Not daring to opposeAway from their profundity of surface.To run, as in the time of the bee, seekingDim, and die tonight?The pain of being born into matter.More beautiful than anything in this world.Hoarfrost is in his bones and on his head,At San Biagio, in the most intense roomBut snow has gathered there, has piled up,
